name: Mercy Mountain Housing
description: Provides rental and acquisition services for transitional and permanent housing for low-income persons. Specializes in affordable housing solutions for individuals and families in need of stable housing options.
source: Verified from multiple online sources and community resource directories
eligibility_requirements: Low-income individuals and families seeking affordable housing
populations_served: Low-income individuals, families, veterans, and those in need of transitional or permanent housing
cost_information: Contact for pricing and eligibility requirements
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2024-01-15. CITATIONS: Address 1866 Whetstone Road, Rockholds, KY 40759 verified from multiple sources including VRUCK veterans resource directory (https://vruck.org/venue/mercy-mountain-housing/), TheHelpList.com community resource guide (https://www.thehelplist.com/helplist/mercy_mounta-Rockho-40759), and Kentucky government resource documents. Phone number (866) 338-0557 confirmed as corporate toll-free number for Mercy Housing. Services verified as 'rental and acquisition for transitional and permanent housing for low-income persons' from multiple community resource listings. Organization appears to serve veterans and low-income individuals. All information cross-referenced across multiple sources for consistency.
